緃字的基本解释

緃
zōng
有文彩，可以缘饰衣服等的织物。
车马的装饰物。

緃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《集韻》將容切，平鍾，精。］
(1)衣物边缘的饰品。
(2)车马饰物。

緃字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緃； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页929第01
【集韻】將容切，音蹤。【說文】䋐屬。【類篇】一曰車馬飾。　又【集韻】足用切，音縱。義同。

緃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
緃字的起名意思

暂无。

緃
Basic explanation of words
緃
zōng
There are texts and colors, which can be decorated with fabrics such as clothes.
Ornaments for carriages and horses.
緃
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Jiyun" will be Rongqie, Pingzhong, Jing. ]
(1) Ornaments on the edge of clothing.
(2) Car and horse ornaments.
緃
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　緃; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 929 01
[Jiyun] Cut the content and track the sound. [Said the text] belongs to the family. 【Classes】One is the car and horse ornaments.　[Jiyun] Fully cut, sound vertical. The same meaning.
